mainText:
Dear Steve,

You should be part of my future.... not part of my past.   You should be 
part of our collective humanity and not yet part of our history.   In 
times like this we need those very few that enable us to be more than we 
can.   I am worried that the obvious no longer can be realized without 
those visionary enough to see it.

Sleep Well... my Hero.
author: Ted
